== Joida (602726) ==
      
Joida is a village in the [[Supa]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1968.12 hectares and harbouring 836 households with total population of 3452 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[DANDELI]] is at a distance of 23 km. Male population is 1687 and female population is 1765. Scheduled Caste Population is 403 and Scheduled Tribes population is 96. Census Location Code of the village is 602726<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 2505
* Literate male population: 1355 (80.32%)
* Literate female population: 1150 (65.16%)
